test_case = int(raw_input())
         
if test_case >= 1 and test_case <= 10000:
     	for i in range(0, test_case):
       		input = int(raw_input())
        		
       		if input >= 1 and input <= 1000000000:
        		
       			if input %2 == 0:	
       				print "ALICE"
       			else:
       				print "BOB"
